item.title: Self-eliminations and shiny silver for IC Fencing
item.author: Ben Fry,
item.description: Valentine’s Day: 22 fencers, 6 competitions, 4 Imperial self-eliminations, 3 days, and 1 silver medal! On the evening of Valentine’s, while most people were with loved ones, 9 fencers set off to Sheffield to show their love of fencing. They were attending BUCS Individuals where university fencers …
